pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rfc3986-validatorA pure python RFC3986 validator[![image](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/rfc3986_validator.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/rfc3986_validator)[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/naimetti/rfc3986-validator.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/naimetti/rfc3986-validator)# Install```shell scriptpip install rfc3986-validator```# Usage```pycon>>> from rfc3986_validator import validate_rfc3986>>> validate_rfc3986('http://foo.bar?q=Spaces should be encoded')False>>> validate_rfc3986('http://foo.com/blah_blah_(wikipedia)')True```It also support validate [URI-reference](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#page-49) rule ```pycon>>> validate_rfc3986('//foo.com/blah_blah', rule='URI_reference')True``` - Free software: MIT license
